<Text: William Davies

Text: William Davies (screenwriter):  He has written and co-written a number of films including 1988's "Twins", "The Real McCoy", "Johnny English", "Alien Autopsy", "Flushed Away", "How to Train Your Dragon", "Johnny English Reborn" and "Puss in Boots".
